name: lemonade
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 80 HP.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A very sweet drink
that restores HP
by 80 points.

A very sweet drink
that restores HP
by 80 points.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A very sweet drink.
It restores the HP of one POKéMON
by 80 points.

80 points.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A very sweet and refreshing drink.
When consumed, it restores
80 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A very sweet and refreshing drink. When consumed,
it restores up to 70 HP to an injured Pokémon.

A very sweet and refreshing drink. When consumed,
